00057 static int tbf_jobid_cache_size = 8192;
00058 module_param(tbf_jobid_cache_size, int, 0644);
00059 MODULE_PARM_DESC(tbf_jobid_cache_size, "The size of jobid cache");

00066 module_param(tbf_depth, int, 0644);

00069 static enum hrtimer_restart nrs_tbf_timer_cb(struct hrtimer *timer)
00070 {
00071         struct nrs_tbf_head *head = container_of(timer, struct nrs_tbf_head,
00072                                                  th_timer);
00073         struct ptlrpc_nrs   *nrs = head->th_res.res_policy->pol_nrs;
00074         struct ptlrpc_service_part *svcpt = nrs->nrs_svcpt;
00075 
00076         nrs->nrs_throttling = 0;
00077         wake_up(&svcpt->scp_waitq);
00078 
00079         return HRTIMER_NORESTART;
00080 }

00082 #define NRS_TBF_DEFAULT_RULE "default"
00083 
00084 static void nrs_tbf_rule_fini(struct nrs_tbf_rule *rule)
00085 {
00086         LASSERT(atomic_read(&rule->tr_ref) == 0);
00087         LASSERT(list_empty(&rule->tr_cli_list));
00088         LASSERT(list_empty(&rule->tr_linkage));
00089 
00090         rule->tr_head->th_ops->o_rule_fini(rule);
00091         OBD_FREE_PTR(rule);
00092 }
00093 
00100 static void nrs_tbf_rule_put(struct nrs_tbf_rule *rule)
00101 {
00102         if (atomic_dec_and_test(&rule->tr_ref))
00103                 nrs_tbf_rule_fini(rule);
00104 }
00105 
00109 static inline void nrs_tbf_rule_get(struct nrs_tbf_rule *rule)
00110 {
00111         atomic_inc(&rule->tr_ref);
00112 }
00113 
00114 static void
00115 nrs_tbf_cli_rule_put(struct nrs_tbf_client *cli)
00116 {
00117         LASSERT(!list_empty(&cli->tc_linkage));
00118         LASSERT(cli->tc_rule);
00119         spin_lock(&cli->tc_rule->tr_rule_lock);
00120         list_del_init(&cli->tc_linkage);
00121         spin_unlock(&cli->tc_rule->tr_rule_lock);
00122         nrs_tbf_rule_put(cli->tc_rule);
00123         cli->tc_rule = NULL;
00124 }
00125 
00126 static void
00127 nrs_tbf_cli_reset_value(struct nrs_tbf_head *head,
00128                         struct nrs_tbf_client *cli)
00129 
00130 {
00131         struct nrs_tbf_rule *rule = cli->tc_rule;
00132 
00133         cli->tc_rpc_rate = rule->tr_rpc_rate;
00134         cli->tc_nsecs = rule->tr_nsecs;
00135         cli->tc_depth = rule->tr_depth;
00136         cli->tc_ntoken = rule->tr_depth;
00137         cli->tc_check_time = ktime_to_ns(ktime_get());
00138         cli->tc_rule_sequence = atomic_read(&head->th_rule_sequence);
00139         cli->tc_rule_generation = rule->tr_generation;
00140 
00141         if (cli->tc_in_heap)
00142                 cfs_binheap_relocate(head->th_binheap,
00143                                      &cli->tc_node);
00144 }
00145 
00146 static void
00147 nrs_tbf_cli_reset(struct nrs_tbf_head *head,
00148                   struct nrs_tbf_rule *rule,
00149                   struct nrs_tbf_client *cli)
00150 {
00151         spin_lock(&cli->tc_rule_lock);
00152         if (cli->tc_rule != NULL && !list_empty(&cli->tc_linkage)) {
00153                 LASSERT(rule != cli->tc_rule);
00154                 nrs_tbf_cli_rule_put(cli);
00155         }
00156         LASSERT(cli->tc_rule == NULL);
00157         LASSERT(list_empty(&cli->tc_linkage));
00158         /* Rule's ref is added before called */
00159         cli->tc_rule = rule;
00160         spin_lock(&rule->tr_rule_lock);
00161         list_add_tail(&cli->tc_linkage, &rule->tr_cli_list);
00162         spin_unlock(&rule->tr_rule_lock);
00163         spin_unlock(&cli->tc_rule_lock);
00164         nrs_tbf_cli_reset_value(head, cli);
00165 }

00167 static int
00168 nrs_tbf_rule_dump(struct nrs_tbf_rule *rule, struct seq_file *m)
00169 {
00170         return rule->tr_head->th_ops->o_rule_dump(rule, m);
00171 }
00172 
00173 static int
00174 nrs_tbf_rule_dump_all(struct nrs_tbf_head *head, struct seq_file *m)
00175 {
00176         struct nrs_tbf_rule *rule;
00177         int rc = 0;
00178 
00179         LASSERT(head != NULL);
00180         spin_lock(&head->th_rule_lock);
00181         /* List the rules from newest to oldest */
00182         list_for_each_entry(rule, &head->th_list, tr_linkage) {
00183                 LASSERT((rule->tr_flags & NTRS_STOPPING) == 0);
00184                 rc = nrs_tbf_rule_dump(rule, m);
00185                 if (rc) {
00186                         rc = -ENOSPC;
00187                         break;
00188                 }
00189         }
00190         spin_unlock(&head->th_rule_lock);
00191 
00192         return rc;
00193 }

00195 static struct nrs_tbf_rule *
00196 nrs_tbf_rule_find_nolock(struct nrs_tbf_head *head,
00197                          const char *name)
00198 {
00199         struct nrs_tbf_rule *rule;
00200 
00201         LASSERT(head != NULL);
00202         list_for_each_entry(rule, &head->th_list, tr_linkage) {
00203                 LASSERT((rule->tr_flags & NTRS_STOPPING) == 0);
00204                 if (strcmp(rule->tr_name, name) == 0) {
00205                         nrs_tbf_rule_get(rule);
00206                         return rule;
00207                 }
00208         }
00209         return NULL;
00210 }
00211 
00212 static struct nrs_tbf_rule *
00213 nrs_tbf_rule_find(struct nrs_tbf_head *head,
00214                   const char *name)
00215 {
00216         struct nrs_tbf_rule *rule;
00217 
00218         LASSERT(head != NULL);
00219         spin_lock(&head->th_rule_lock);
00220         rule = nrs_tbf_rule_find_nolock(head, name);
00221         spin_unlock(&head->th_rule_lock);
00222         return rule;
00223 }
00224 
00225 static struct nrs_tbf_rule *
00226 nrs_tbf_rule_match(struct nrs_tbf_head *head,
00227                    struct nrs_tbf_client *cli)
00228 {
00229         struct nrs_tbf_rule *rule = NULL;
00230         struct nrs_tbf_rule *tmp_rule;
00231 
00232         spin_lock(&head->th_rule_lock);
00233         /* Match the newest rule in the list */
00234         list_for_each_entry(tmp_rule, &head->th_list, tr_linkage) {
00235                 LASSERT((tmp_rule->tr_flags & NTRS_STOPPING) == 0);
00236                 if (head->th_ops->o_rule_match(tmp_rule, cli)) {
00237                         rule = tmp_rule;
00238                         break;
00239                 }
00240         }
00241 
00242         if (rule == NULL)
00243                 rule = head->th_rule;
00244 
00245         nrs_tbf_rule_get(rule);
00246         spin_unlock(&head->th_rule_lock);
00247         return rule;
00248 }
00249 
00250 static void
00251 nrs_tbf_cli_init(struct nrs_tbf_head *head,
00252                  struct nrs_tbf_client *cli,
00253                  struct ptlrpc_request *req)
00254 {
00255         struct nrs_tbf_rule *rule;
00256 
00257         cli->tc_in_heap = false;
00258         head->th_ops->o_cli_init(cli, req);
00259         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&cli->tc_list);
00260         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&cli->tc_linkage);
00261         spin_lock_init(&cli->tc_rule_lock);
00262         atomic_set(&cli->tc_ref, 1);
00263         rule = nrs_tbf_rule_match(head, cli);
00264         nrs_tbf_cli_reset(head, rule, cli);
00265 }
00266 
00267 static void
00268 nrs_tbf_cli_fini(struct nrs_tbf_client *cli)
00269 {
00270         LASSERT(list_empty(&cli->tc_list));
00271         LASSERT(!cli->tc_in_heap);
00272         LASSERT(atomic_read(&cli->tc_ref) == 0);
00273         spin_lock(&cli->tc_rule_lock);
00274         nrs_tbf_cli_rule_put(cli);
00275         spin_unlock(&cli->tc_rule_lock);
00276         OBD_FREE_PTR(cli);
00277 }
00278 
00279 static int
00280 nrs_tbf_rule_start(struct ptlrpc_nrs_policy *policy,
00281                    struct nrs_tbf_head *head,
00282                    struct nrs_tbf_cmd *start)
00283 {
00284         struct nrs_tbf_rule *rule, *tmp_rule;
00285         int rc;
00286 
00287         rule = nrs_tbf_rule_find(head, start->tc_name);
00288         if (rule) {
00289                 nrs_tbf_rule_put(rule);
00290                 return -EEXIST;
00291         }
00292 
00293         OBD_CPT_ALLOC_PTR(rule, nrs_pol2cptab(policy), nrs_pol2cptid(policy));
00294         if (rule == NULL)
00295                 return -ENOMEM;
00296 
00297         memcpy(rule->tr_name, start->tc_name, strlen(start->tc_name));
00298         rule->tr_rpc_rate = start->tc_rpc_rate;
00299         rule->tr_nsecs = NSEC_PER_SEC;
00300         do_div(rule->tr_nsecs, rule->tr_rpc_rate);
00301         rule->tr_depth = tbf_depth;
00302         atomic_set(&rule->tr_ref, 1);
00303         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&rule->tr_cli_list);
00304         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&rule->tr_nids);
00305         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&rule->tr_linkage);
00306         spin_lock_init(&rule->tr_rule_lock);
00307         rule->tr_head = head;
00308 
00309         rc = head->th_ops->o_rule_init(policy, rule, start);
00310         if (rc) {
00311                 OBD_FREE_PTR(rule);
00312                 return rc;
00313         }
00314 
00315         /* Add as the newest rule */
00316         spin_lock(&head->th_rule_lock);
00317         tmp_rule = nrs_tbf_rule_find_nolock(head, start->tc_name);
00318         if (tmp_rule) {
00319                 spin_unlock(&head->th_rule_lock);
00320                 nrs_tbf_rule_put(tmp_rule);
00321                 nrs_tbf_rule_put(rule);
00322                 return -EEXIST;
00323         }
00324         list_add(&rule->tr_linkage, &head->th_list);
00325         spin_unlock(&head->th_rule_lock);
00326         atomic_inc(&head->th_rule_sequence);
00327         if (start->tc_rule_flags & NTRS_DEFAULT) {
00328                 rule->tr_flags |= NTRS_DEFAULT;
00329                 LASSERT(head->th_rule == NULL);
00330                 head->th_rule = rule;
00331         }
00332 
00333         return 0;
00334 }
00335 
00336 static int
00337 nrs_tbf_rule_change(struct ptlrpc_nrs_policy *policy,
00338                     struct nrs_tbf_head *head,
00339                     struct nrs_tbf_cmd *change)
00340 {
00341         struct nrs_tbf_rule *rule;
00342 
00343         assert_spin_locked(&policy->pol_nrs->nrs_lock);
00344 
00345         rule = nrs_tbf_rule_find(head, change->tc_name);
00346         if (rule == NULL)
00347                 return -ENOENT;
00348 
00349         rule->tr_rpc_rate = change->tc_rpc_rate;
00350         rule->tr_nsecs = NSEC_PER_SEC;
00351         do_div(rule->tr_nsecs, rule->tr_rpc_rate);
00352         rule->tr_generation++;
00353         nrs_tbf_rule_put(rule);
00354 
00355         return 0;
00356 }
00357 
00358 static int
00359 nrs_tbf_rule_stop(struct ptlrpc_nrs_policy *policy,
00360                   struct nrs_tbf_head *head,
00361                   struct nrs_tbf_cmd *stop)
00362 {
00363         struct nrs_tbf_rule *rule;
00364 
00365         assert_spin_locked(&policy->pol_nrs->nrs_lock);
00366 
00367         if (strcmp(stop->tc_name, NRS_TBF_DEFAULT_RULE) == 0)
00368                 return -EPERM;
00369 
00370         rule = nrs_tbf_rule_find(head, stop->tc_name);
00371         if (rule == NULL)
00372                 return -ENOENT;
00373 
00374         list_del_init(&rule->tr_linkage);
00375         rule->tr_flags |= NTRS_STOPPING;
00376         nrs_tbf_rule_put(rule);
00377         nrs_tbf_rule_put(rule);
00378 
00379         return 0;
00380 }
00381 
00382 static int
00383 nrs_tbf_command(struct ptlrpc_nrs_policy *policy,
00384                 struct nrs_tbf_head *head,
00385                 struct nrs_tbf_cmd *cmd)
00386 {
00387         int rc;
00388 
00389         assert_spin_locked(&policy->pol_nrs->nrs_lock);
00390 
00391         switch (cmd->tc_cmd) {
00392         case NRS_CTL_TBF_START_RULE:
00393                 if (!(cmd->tc_valid_types & head->th_type_flag))
00394                         return -EINVAL;
00395 
00396                 spin_unlock(&policy->pol_nrs->nrs_lock);
00397                 rc = nrs_tbf_rule_start(policy, head, cmd);
00398                 spin_lock(&policy->pol_nrs->nrs_lock);
00399                 return rc;
00400         case NRS_CTL_TBF_CHANGE_RATE:
00401                 rc = nrs_tbf_rule_change(policy, head, cmd);
00402                 return rc;
00403         case NRS_CTL_TBF_STOP_RULE:
00404                 rc = nrs_tbf_rule_stop(policy, head, cmd);
00405                 /* Take it as a success, if not exists at all */
00406                 return rc == -ENOENT ? 0 : rc;
00407         default:
00408                 return -EFAULT;
00409         }
00410 }
00411 
00421 static int
00422 tbf_cli_compare(struct cfs_binheap_node *e1, struct cfs_binheap_node *e2)
00423 {
00424         struct nrs_tbf_client *cli1;
00425         struct nrs_tbf_client *cli2;
00426 
00427         cli1 = container_of(e1, struct nrs_tbf_client, tc_node);
00428         cli2 = container_of(e2, struct nrs_tbf_client, tc_node);
00429 
00430         if (cli1->tc_check_time + cli1->tc_nsecs <
00431             cli2->tc_check_time + cli2->tc_nsecs)
00432                 return 1;
00433         else if (cli1->tc_check_time + cli1->tc_nsecs >
00434                  cli2->tc_check_time + cli2->tc_nsecs)
00435                 return 0;
00436 
00437         if (cli1->tc_check_time < cli2->tc_check_time)
00438                 return 1;
00439         else if (cli1->tc_check_time > cli2->tc_check_time)
00440                 return 0;
00441 
00442         /* Maybe need more comparasion, e.g. request number in the rules */
00443         return 1;
00444 }

00514 static struct cfs_hash_ops nrs_tbf_jobid_hash_ops = {
00515         .hs_hash        = nrs_tbf_jobid_hop_hash,
00516         .hs_keycmp      = nrs_tbf_jobid_hop_keycmp,
00517         .hs_key         = nrs_tbf_jobid_hop_key,
00518         .hs_object      = nrs_tbf_jobid_hop_object,
00519         .hs_get         = nrs_tbf_jobid_hop_get,
00520         .hs_put         = nrs_tbf_jobid_hop_put,
00521         .hs_put_locked  = nrs_tbf_jobid_hop_put,
00522         .hs_exit        = nrs_tbf_jobid_hop_exit,

00525 #define NRS_TBF_JOBID_HASH_FLAGS (CFS_HASH_SPIN_BKTLOCK | \
00526                                   CFS_HASH_NO_ITEMREF | \
00527                                   CFS_HASH_DEPTH)
00528 
00529 static struct nrs_tbf_client *
00530 nrs_tbf_jobid_hash_lookup(struct cfs_hash *hs,
00531                           struct cfs_hash_bd *bd,
00532                           const char *jobid)
00533 {
00534         struct hlist_node *hnode;
00535         struct nrs_tbf_client *cli;
00536 
00537         /* cfs_hash_bd_peek_locked is a somehow "internal" function
00538          * of cfs_hash, it doesn't add refcount on object. */
00539         hnode = cfs_hash_bd_peek_locked(hs, bd, (void *)jobid);
00540         if (hnode == NULL)
00541                 return NULL;
00542 
00543         cfs_hash_get(hs, hnode);
00544         cli = container_of0(hnode, struct nrs_tbf_client, tc_hnode);
00545         if (!list_empty(&cli->tc_lru))
00546                 list_del_init(&cli->tc_lru);
00547         return cli;
00548 }
00549 
00550 #define NRS_TBF_JOBID_NULL ""
00551 
00552 static struct nrs_tbf_client *
00553 nrs_tbf_jobid_cli_find(struct nrs_tbf_head *head,
00554                        struct ptlrpc_request *req)
00555 {
00556         const char              *jobid;
00557         struct nrs_tbf_client   *cli;
00558         struct cfs_hash         *hs = head->th_cli_hash;
00559         struct cfs_hash_bd               bd;
00560 
00561         jobid = lustre_msg_get_jobid(req->rq_reqmsg);
00562         if (jobid == NULL)
00563                 jobid = NRS_TBF_JOBID_NULL;
00564         cfs_hash_bd_get_and_lock(hs, (void *)jobid, &bd, 1);
00565         cli = nrs_tbf_jobid_hash_lookup(hs, &bd, jobid);
00566         cfs_hash_bd_unlock(hs, &bd, 1);
00567 
00568         return cli;
00569 }
00570 
00571 static struct nrs_tbf_client *
00572 nrs_tbf_jobid_cli_findadd(struct nrs_tbf_head *head,
00573                           struct nrs_tbf_client *cli)
00574 {
00575         const char              *jobid;
00576         struct nrs_tbf_client   *ret;
00577         struct cfs_hash         *hs = head->th_cli_hash;
00578         struct cfs_hash_bd               bd;
00579 
00580         jobid = cli->tc_jobid;
00581         cfs_hash_bd_get_and_lock(hs, (void *)jobid, &bd, 1);
00582         ret = nrs_tbf_jobid_hash_lookup(hs, &bd, jobid);
00583         if (ret == NULL) {
00584                 cfs_hash_bd_add_locked(hs, &bd, &cli->tc_hnode);
00585                 ret = cli;
00586         }
00587         cfs_hash_bd_unlock(hs, &bd, 1);
00588 
00589         return ret;
00590 }
00591 
00592 static void
00593 nrs_tbf_jobid_cli_put(struct nrs_tbf_head *head,
00594                       struct nrs_tbf_client *cli)
00595 {
00596         struct cfs_hash_bd               bd;
00597         struct cfs_hash         *hs = head->th_cli_hash;
00598         struct nrs_tbf_bucket   *bkt;
00599         int                      hw;
00600         struct list_head        zombies;
00601 
00602         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&zombies);
00603         cfs_hash_bd_get(hs, &cli->tc_jobid, &bd);
00604         bkt = cfs_hash_bd_extra_get(hs, &bd);
00605         if (!cfs_hash_bd_dec_and_lock(hs, &bd, &cli->tc_ref))
00606                 return;
00607         LASSERT(list_empty(&cli->tc_lru));
00608         list_add_tail(&cli->tc_lru, &bkt->ntb_lru);
00609 
00610         /*
00611          * Check and purge the LRU, there is at least one client in the LRU.
00612          */
00613         hw = tbf_jobid_cache_size >>
00614              (hs->hs_cur_bits - hs->hs_bkt_bits);
00615         while (cfs_hash_bd_count_get(&bd) > hw) {
00616                 if (unlikely(list_empty(&bkt->ntb_lru)))
00617                         break;
00618                 cli = list_entry(bkt->ntb_lru.next,
00619                                      struct nrs_tbf_client,
00620                                      tc_lru);
00621                 LASSERT(atomic_read(&cli->tc_ref) == 0);
00622                 cfs_hash_bd_del_locked(hs, &bd, &cli->tc_hnode);
00623                 list_move(&cli->tc_lru, &zombies);
00624         }
00625         cfs_hash_bd_unlock(head->th_cli_hash, &bd, 1);
00626 
00627         while (!list_empty(&zombies)) {
00628                 cli = container_of0(zombies.next,
00629                                     struct nrs_tbf_client, tc_lru);
00630                 list_del_init(&cli->tc_lru);
00631                 nrs_tbf_cli_fini(cli);
00632         }
00633 }
00634 
00635 static void
00636 nrs_tbf_jobid_cli_init(struct nrs_tbf_client *cli,
00637                        struct ptlrpc_request *req)
00638 {
00639         char *jobid = lustre_msg_get_jobid(req->rq_reqmsg);
00640 
00641         if (jobid == NULL)
00642                 jobid = NRS_TBF_JOBID_NULL;
00643         LASSERT(strlen(jobid) < LUSTRE_JOBID_SIZE);
00644         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&cli->tc_lru);
00645         memcpy(cli->tc_jobid, jobid, strlen(jobid));
00646 }
00647 
00648 static int nrs_tbf_jobid_hash_order(void)
00649 {
00650         int bits;
00651 
00652         for (bits = 1; (1 << bits) < tbf_jobid_cache_size; ++bits)
00653                 ;
00654 
00655         return bits;
00656 }
00657 
00658 #define NRS_TBF_JOBID_BKT_BITS 10
00659 
00660 static int
00661 nrs_tbf_jobid_startup(struct ptlrpc_nrs_policy *policy,
00662                       struct nrs_tbf_head *head)
00663 {
00664         struct nrs_tbf_cmd       start;
00665         struct nrs_tbf_bucket   *bkt;
00666         int                      bits;
00667         int                      i;
00668         int                      rc;
00669         struct cfs_hash_bd       bd;
00670 
00671         bits = nrs_tbf_jobid_hash_order();
00672         if (bits < NRS_TBF_JOBID_BKT_BITS)
00673                 bits = NRS_TBF_JOBID_BKT_BITS;
00674         head->th_cli_hash = cfs_hash_create("nrs_tbf_hash",
00675                                             bits,
00676                                             bits,
00677                                             NRS_TBF_JOBID_BKT_BITS,
00678                                             sizeof(*bkt),
00679                                             0,
00680                                             0,
00681                                             &nrs_tbf_jobid_hash_ops,
00682                                             NRS_TBF_JOBID_HASH_FLAGS);
00683         if (head->th_cli_hash == NULL)
00684                 return -ENOMEM;
00685 
00686         cfs_hash_for_each_bucket(head->th_cli_hash, &bd, i) {
00687                 bkt = cfs_hash_bd_extra_get(head->th_cli_hash, &bd);
00688                 INIT_LIST_HEAD(&bkt->ntb_lru);
00689         }
00690 
00691         memset(&start, 0, sizeof(start));
00692         start.tc_jobids_str = "*";
00693 
00694         start.tc_rpc_rate = tbf_rate;
00695         start.tc_rule_flags = NTRS_DEFAULT;
00696         start.tc_name = NRS_TBF_DEFAULT_RULE;
00697         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&start.tc_jobids);
00698         rc = nrs_tbf_rule_start(policy, head, &start);
00699 
00700         return rc;
00701 }
00702 
00707 static void
00708 nrs_tbf_jobid_list_free(struct list_head *jobid_list)
00709 {
00710         struct nrs_tbf_jobid *jobid, *n;
00711 
00712         list_for_each_entry_safe(jobid, n, jobid_list, tj_linkage) {
00713                 OBD_FREE(jobid->tj_id, strlen(jobid->tj_id) + 1);
00714                 list_del(&jobid->tj_linkage);
00715                 OBD_FREE(jobid, sizeof(struct nrs_tbf_jobid));
00716         }
00717 }
00718 
00719 static int
00720 nrs_tbf_jobid_list_add(const struct cfs_lstr *id, struct list_head *jobid_list)
00721 {
00722         struct nrs_tbf_jobid *jobid;
00723 
00724         OBD_ALLOC(jobid, sizeof(struct nrs_tbf_jobid));
00725         if (jobid == NULL)
00726                 return -ENOMEM;
00727 
00728         OBD_ALLOC(jobid->tj_id, id->ls_len + 1);
00729         if (jobid->tj_id == NULL) {
00730                 OBD_FREE(jobid, sizeof(struct nrs_tbf_jobid));
00731                 return -ENOMEM;
00732         }
00733 
00734         memcpy(jobid->tj_id, id->ls_str, id->ls_len);
00735         list_add_tail(&jobid->tj_linkage, jobid_list);
00736         return 0;
00737 }
00738 
00739 static int
00740 nrs_tbf_jobid_list_match(struct list_head *jobid_list, char *id)
00741 {
00742         struct nrs_tbf_jobid *jobid;
00743 
00744         list_for_each_entry(jobid, jobid_list, tj_linkage) {
00745                 if (strcmp(id, jobid->tj_id) == 0)
00746                         return 1;
00747         }
00748         return 0;
00749 }
00750 
00751 static int
00752 nrs_tbf_jobid_list_parse(char *str, int len, struct list_head *jobid_list)
00753 {
00754         struct cfs_lstr src;
00755         struct cfs_lstr res;
00756         int rc = 0;
00757         ENTRY;
00758 
00759         src.ls_str = str;
00760         src.ls_len = len;
00761         INIT_LIST_HEAD(jobid_list);
00762         while (src.ls_str) {
00763                 rc = cfs_gettok(&src, ' ', &res);
00764                 if (rc == 0) {
00765                         rc = -EINVAL;
00766                         break;
00767                 }
00768                 rc = nrs_tbf_jobid_list_add(&res, jobid_list);
00769                 if (rc)
00770                         break;
00771         }
00772         if (rc)
00773                 nrs_tbf_jobid_list_free(jobid_list);
00774         RETURN(rc);
00775 }
00776 
00777 static void nrs_tbf_jobid_cmd_fini(struct nrs_tbf_cmd *cmd)
00778 {
00779         if (!list_empty(&cmd->tc_jobids))
00780                 nrs_tbf_jobid_list_free(&cmd->tc_jobids);
00781         if (cmd->tc_jobids_str)
00782                 OBD_FREE(cmd->tc_jobids_str, strlen(cmd->tc_jobids_str) + 1);
00783 }
00784 
00785 static int nrs_tbf_jobid_parse(struct nrs_tbf_cmd *cmd, const char *id)
00786 {
00787         int rc;
00788 
00789         OBD_ALLOC(cmd->tc_jobids_str, strlen(id) + 1);
00790         if (cmd->tc_jobids_str == NULL)
00791                 return -ENOMEM;
00792 
00793         memcpy(cmd->tc_jobids_str, id, strlen(id));
00794 
00795         /* parse jobid list */
00796         rc = nrs_tbf_jobid_list_parse(cmd->tc_jobids_str,
00797                                       strlen(cmd->tc_jobids_str),
00798                                       &cmd->tc_jobids);
00799         if (rc)
00800                 nrs_tbf_jobid_cmd_fini(cmd);
00801 
00802         return rc;
00803 }
00804 
00805 static int nrs_tbf_jobid_rule_init(struct ptlrpc_nrs_policy *policy,
00806                                    struct nrs_tbf_rule *rule,
00807                                    struct nrs_tbf_cmd *start)
00808 {
00809         int rc = 0;
00810 
00811         LASSERT(start->tc_jobids_str);
00812         OBD_ALLOC(rule->tr_jobids_str,
00813                   strlen(start->tc_jobids_str) + 1);
00814         if (rule->tr_jobids_str == NULL)
00815                 return -ENOMEM;
00816 
00817         memcpy(rule->tr_jobids_str,
00818                start->tc_jobids_str,
00819                strlen(start->tc_jobids_str));
00820 
00821         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&rule->tr_jobids);
00822         if (!list_empty(&start->tc_jobids)) {
00823                 rc = nrs_tbf_jobid_list_parse(rule->tr_jobids_str,
00824                                               strlen(rule->tr_jobids_str),
00825                                               &rule->tr_jobids);
00826                 if (rc)
00827                         CERROR("jobids {%s} illegal\n", rule->tr_jobids_str);
00828         }
00829         if (rc)
00830                 OBD_FREE(rule->tr_jobids_str,
00831                          strlen(start->tc_jobids_str) + 1);
00832         return rc;
00833 }
00834 
00835 static int
00836 nrs_tbf_jobid_rule_dump(struct nrs_tbf_rule *rule, struct seq_file *m)
00837 {
00838         seq_printf(m, "%s {%s} %llu, ref %d\n", rule->tr_name,
00839                           rule->tr_jobids_str, rule->tr_rpc_rate,
00840                           atomic_read(&rule->tr_ref) - 1);
00841         return 0;
00842 }
00843 
00844 static int
00845 nrs_tbf_jobid_rule_match(struct nrs_tbf_rule *rule,
00846                          struct nrs_tbf_client *cli)
00847 {
00848         return nrs_tbf_jobid_list_match(&rule->tr_jobids, cli->tc_jobid);
00849 }
00850 
00851 static void nrs_tbf_jobid_rule_fini(struct nrs_tbf_rule *rule)
00852 {
00853         if (!list_empty(&rule->tr_jobids))
00854                 nrs_tbf_jobid_list_free(&rule->tr_jobids);
00855         LASSERT(rule->tr_jobids_str != NULL);
00856         OBD_FREE(rule->tr_jobids_str, strlen(rule->tr_jobids_str) + 1);
00857 }
00858 
00859 static struct nrs_tbf_ops nrs_tbf_jobid_ops = {
00860         .o_name = NRS_TBF_TYPE_JOBID,
00861         .o_startup = nrs_tbf_jobid_startup,
00862         .o_cli_find = nrs_tbf_jobid_cli_find,
00863         .o_cli_findadd = nrs_tbf_jobid_cli_findadd,
00864         .o_cli_put = nrs_tbf_jobid_cli_put,
00865         .o_cli_init = nrs_tbf_jobid_cli_init,
00866         .o_rule_init = nrs_tbf_jobid_rule_init,
00867         .o_rule_dump = nrs_tbf_jobid_rule_dump,
00868         .o_rule_match = nrs_tbf_jobid_rule_match,
00869         .o_rule_fini = nrs_tbf_jobid_rule_fini,
00870 };
00871 
00878 #define NRS_TBF_NID_BKT_BITS    8
00879 #define NRS_TBF_NID_BITS        16
00880 
00881 static unsigned nrs_tbf_nid_hop_hash(struct cfs_hash *hs, const void *key,
00882                                   unsigned mask)
00883 {
00884         return cfs_hash_djb2_hash(key, sizeof(lnet_nid_t), mask);
00885 }
00886 
00887 static int nrs_tbf_nid_hop_keycmp(const void *key, struct hlist_node *hnode)
00888 {
00889         lnet_nid_t            *nid = (lnet_nid_t *)key;
00890         struct nrs_tbf_client *cli = hlist_entry(hnode,
00891                                                      struct nrs_tbf_client,
00892                                                      tc_hnode);
00893 
00894         return *nid == cli->tc_nid;
00895 }
00896 
00897 static void *nrs_tbf_nid_hop_key(struct hlist_node *hnode)
00898 {
00899         struct nrs_tbf_client *cli = hlist_entry(hnode,
00900                                                      struct nrs_tbf_client,
00901                                                      tc_hnode);
00902 
00903         return &cli->tc_nid;
00904 }
00905 
00906 static void *nrs_tbf_nid_hop_object(struct hlist_node *hnode)
00907 {
00908         return hlist_entry(hnode, struct nrs_tbf_client, tc_hnode);
00909 }
00910 
00911 static void nrs_tbf_nid_hop_get(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct hlist_node *hnode)
00912 {
00913         struct nrs_tbf_client *cli = hlist_entry(hnode,
00914                                                      struct nrs_tbf_client,
00915                                                      tc_hnode);
00916 
00917         atomic_inc(&cli->tc_ref);
00918 }
00919 
00920 static void nrs_tbf_nid_hop_put(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct hlist_node *hnode)
00921 {
00922         struct nrs_tbf_client *cli = hlist_entry(hnode,
00923                                                      struct nrs_tbf_client,
00924                                                      tc_hnode);
00925 
00926         atomic_dec(&cli->tc_ref);
00927 }
00928 
00929 static void nrs_tbf_nid_hop_exit(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct hlist_node *hnode)
00930 {
00931         struct nrs_tbf_client *cli = hlist_entry(hnode,
00932                                                      struct nrs_tbf_client,
00933                                                      tc_hnode);
00934 
00935         LASSERTF(atomic_read(&cli->tc_ref) == 0,
00936                  "Busy TBF object from client with NID %s, with %d refs\n",
00937                  libcfs_nid2str(cli->tc_nid), atomic_read(&cli->tc_ref));
00938 
00939         nrs_tbf_cli_fini(cli);
00940 }
00941 
00942 static struct cfs_hash_ops nrs_tbf_nid_hash_ops = {
00943         .hs_hash        = nrs_tbf_nid_hop_hash,
00944         .hs_keycmp      = nrs_tbf_nid_hop_keycmp,
00945         .hs_key         = nrs_tbf_nid_hop_key,
00946         .hs_object      = nrs_tbf_nid_hop_object,
00947         .hs_get         = nrs_tbf_nid_hop_get,
00948         .hs_put         = nrs_tbf_nid_hop_put,
00949         .hs_put_locked  = nrs_tbf_nid_hop_put,
00950         .hs_exit        = nrs_tbf_nid_hop_exit,
00951 };
00952 
00953 static struct nrs_tbf_client *
00954 nrs_tbf_nid_cli_find(struct nrs_tbf_head *head,
00955                      struct ptlrpc_request *req)
00956 {
00957         return cfs_hash_lookup(head->th_cli_hash, &req->rq_peer.nid);
00958 }
00959 
00960 static struct nrs_tbf_client *
00961 nrs_tbf_nid_cli_findadd(struct nrs_tbf_head *head,
00962                         struct nrs_tbf_client *cli)
00963 {
00964         return cfs_hash_findadd_unique(head->th_cli_hash, &cli->tc_nid,
00965                                        &cli->tc_hnode);
00966 }
00967 
00968 static void
00969 nrs_tbf_nid_cli_put(struct nrs_tbf_head *head,
00970                       struct nrs_tbf_client *cli)
00971 {
00972         cfs_hash_put(head->th_cli_hash, &cli->tc_hnode);
00973 }
00974 
00975 static int
00976 nrs_tbf_nid_startup(struct ptlrpc_nrs_policy *policy,
00977                     struct nrs_tbf_head *head)
00978 {
00979         struct nrs_tbf_cmd      start;
00980         int rc;
00981 
00982         head->th_cli_hash = cfs_hash_create("nrs_tbf_hash",
00983                                             NRS_TBF_NID_BITS,
00984                                             NRS_TBF_NID_BITS,
00985                                             NRS_TBF_NID_BKT_BITS, 0,
00986                                             CFS_HASH_MIN_THETA,
00987                                             CFS_HASH_MAX_THETA,
00988                                             &nrs_tbf_nid_hash_ops,
00989                                             CFS_HASH_RW_BKTLOCK);
00990         if (head->th_cli_hash == NULL)
00991                 return -ENOMEM;
00992 
00993         memset(&start, 0, sizeof(start));
00994         start.tc_nids_str = "*";
00995 
00996         start.tc_rpc_rate = tbf_rate;
00997         start.tc_rule_flags = NTRS_DEFAULT;
00998         start.tc_name = NRS_TBF_DEFAULT_RULE;
00999         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&start.tc_nids);
01000         rc = nrs_tbf_rule_start(policy, head, &start);
01001 
01002         return rc;
01003 }
01004 
01005 static void
01006 nrs_tbf_nid_cli_init(struct nrs_tbf_client *cli,
01007                              struct ptlrpc_request *req)
01008 {
01009         cli->tc_nid = req->rq_peer.nid;
01010 }
01011 
01012 static int nrs_tbf_nid_rule_init(struct ptlrpc_nrs_policy *policy,
01013                                  struct nrs_tbf_rule *rule,
01014                                  struct nrs_tbf_cmd *start)
01015 {
01016         LASSERT(start->tc_nids_str);
01017         OBD_ALLOC(rule->tr_nids_str,
01018                   strlen(start->tc_nids_str) + 1);
01019         if (rule->tr_nids_str == NULL)
01020                 return -ENOMEM;
01021 
01022         memcpy(rule->tr_nids_str,
01023                start->tc_nids_str,
01024                strlen(start->tc_nids_str));
01025 
01026         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&rule->tr_nids);
01027         if (!list_empty(&start->tc_nids)) {
01028                 if (cfs_parse_nidlist(rule->tr_nids_str,
01029                                       strlen(rule->tr_nids_str),
01030                                       &rule->tr_nids) <= 0) {
01031                         CERROR("nids {%s} illegal\n",
01032                                rule->tr_nids_str);
01033                         OBD_FREE(rule->tr_nids_str,
01034                                  strlen(start->tc_nids_str) + 1);
01035                         return -EINVAL;
01036                 }
01037         }
01038         return 0;
01039 }
01040 
01041 static int
01042 nrs_tbf_nid_rule_dump(struct nrs_tbf_rule *rule, struct seq_file *m)
01043 {
01044         seq_printf(m, "%s {%s} %llu, ref %d\n", rule->tr_name,
01045                           rule->tr_nids_str, rule->tr_rpc_rate,
01046                           atomic_read(&rule->tr_ref) - 1);
01047         return 0;
01048 }
01049 
01050 static int
01051 nrs_tbf_nid_rule_match(struct nrs_tbf_rule *rule,
01052                        struct nrs_tbf_client *cli)
01053 {
01054         return cfs_match_nid(cli->tc_nid, &rule->tr_nids);
01055 }
01056 
01057 static void nrs_tbf_nid_rule_fini(struct nrs_tbf_rule *rule)
01058 {
01059         if (!list_empty(&rule->tr_nids))
01060                 cfs_free_nidlist(&rule->tr_nids);
01061         LASSERT(rule->tr_nids_str != NULL);
01062         OBD_FREE(rule->tr_nids_str, strlen(rule->tr_nids_str) + 1);
01063 }
01064 
01065 static void nrs_tbf_nid_cmd_fini(struct nrs_tbf_cmd *cmd)
01066 {
01067         if (!list_empty(&cmd->tc_nids))
01068                 cfs_free_nidlist(&cmd->tc_nids);
01069         if (cmd->tc_nids_str)
01070                 OBD_FREE(cmd->tc_nids_str, strlen(cmd->tc_nids_str) + 1);
01071 }
01072 
01073 static int nrs_tbf_nid_parse(struct nrs_tbf_cmd *cmd, const char *id)
01074 {
01075         OBD_ALLOC(cmd->tc_nids_str, strlen(id) + 1);
01076         if (cmd->tc_nids_str == NULL)
01077                 return -ENOMEM;
01078 
01079         memcpy(cmd->tc_nids_str, id, strlen(id));
01080 
01081         /* parse NID list */
01082         if (cfs_parse_nidlist(cmd->tc_nids_str,
01083                               strlen(cmd->tc_nids_str),
01084                               &cmd->tc_nids) <= 0) {
01085                 nrs_tbf_nid_cmd_fini(cmd);
01086                 return -EINVAL;
01087         }
01088 
01089         return 0;
01090 }
01091 
01092 static struct nrs_tbf_ops nrs_tbf_nid_ops = {
01093         .o_name = NRS_TBF_TYPE_NID,
01094         .o_startup = nrs_tbf_nid_startup,
01095         .o_cli_find = nrs_tbf_nid_cli_find,
01096         .o_cli_findadd = nrs_tbf_nid_cli_findadd,
01097         .o_cli_put = nrs_tbf_nid_cli_put,
01098         .o_cli_init = nrs_tbf_nid_cli_init,
01099         .o_rule_init = nrs_tbf_nid_rule_init,
01100         .o_rule_dump = nrs_tbf_nid_rule_dump,
01101         .o_rule_match = nrs_tbf_nid_rule_match,
01102         .o_rule_fini = nrs_tbf_nid_rule_fini,
01103 };
01104 
01118 static int nrs_tbf_start(struct ptlrpc_nrs_policy *policy, char *arg)
01119 {
01120         struct nrs_tbf_head     *head;
01121         struct nrs_tbf_ops      *ops;
01122         __u32                    type;
01123         int rc = 0;
01124 
01125         if (arg == NULL || strlen(arg) > NRS_TBF_TYPE_MAX_LEN)
01126                 GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
01127 
01128         if (strcmp(arg, NRS_TBF_TYPE_NID) == 0) {
01129                 ops = &nrs_tbf_nid_ops;
01130                 type = NRS_TBF_FLAG_NID;
01131         } else if (strcmp(arg, NRS_TBF_TYPE_JOBID) == 0) {
01132                 ops = &nrs_tbf_jobid_ops;
01133                 type = NRS_TBF_FLAG_JOBID;
01134         } else
01135                 GOTO(out, rc = -ENOTSUPP);
01136 
01137         OBD_CPT_ALLOC_PTR(head, nrs_pol2cptab(policy), nrs_pol2cptid(policy));
01138         if (head == NULL)
01139                 GOTO(out, rc = -ENOMEM);
01140 
01141         memcpy(head->th_type, arg, strlen(arg));
01142         head->th_type[strlen(arg)] = '\0';
01143         head->th_ops = ops;
01144         head->th_type_flag = type;
01145 
01146         head->th_binheap = cfs_binheap_create(&nrs_tbf_heap_ops,
01147                                               CBH_FLAG_ATOMIC_GROW, 4096, NULL,
01148                                               nrs_pol2cptab(policy),
01149                                               nrs_pol2cptid(policy));
01150         if (head->th_binheap == NULL)
01151                 GOTO(out_free_head, rc = -ENOMEM);
01152 
01153         atomic_set(&head->th_rule_sequence, 0);
01154         spin_lock_init(&head->th_rule_lock);
01155         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&head->th_list);
01156         hrtimer_init(&head->th_timer, CLOCK_MONOTONIC, HRTIMER_MODE_ABS);
01157         head->th_timer.function = nrs_tbf_timer_cb;
01158         rc = head->th_ops->o_startup(policy, head);
01159         if (rc)
01160                 GOTO(out_free_heap, rc);
01161 
01162         policy->pol_private = head;
01163         return 0;
01164 out_free_heap:
01165         cfs_binheap_destroy(head->th_binheap);
01166 out_free_head:
01167         OBD_FREE_PTR(head);
01168 out:
01169         return rc;
01170 }
01171 
01181 static void nrs_tbf_stop(struct ptlrpc_nrs_policy *policy)
01182 {
01183         struct nrs_tbf_head *head = policy->pol_private;
01184         struct ptlrpc_nrs *nrs = policy->pol_nrs;
01185         struct nrs_tbf_rule *rule, *n;
01186 
01187         LASSERT(head != NULL);
01188         LASSERT(head->th_cli_hash != NULL);
01189         hrtimer_cancel(&head->th_timer);
01190         /* Should cleanup hash first before free rules */
01191         cfs_hash_putref(head->th_cli_hash);
01192         list_for_each_entry_safe(rule, n, &head->th_list, tr_linkage) {
01193                 list_del_init(&rule->tr_linkage);
01194                 nrs_tbf_rule_put(rule);
01195         }
01196         LASSERT(list_empty(&head->th_list));
01197         LASSERT(head->th_binheap != NULL);
01198         LASSERT(cfs_binheap_is_empty(head->th_binheap));
01199         cfs_binheap_destroy(head->th_binheap);
01200         OBD_FREE_PTR(head);
01201         nrs->nrs_throttling = 0;
01202         wake_up(&policy->pol_nrs->nrs_svcpt->scp_waitq);
01203 }
01204 
01219 static int nrs_tbf_ctl(struct ptlrpc_nrs_policy *policy,
01220                        enum ptlrpc_nrs_ctl opc,
01221                        void *arg)
01222 {
01223         int rc = 0;
01224         ENTRY;
01225 
01226         assert_spin_locked(&policy->pol_nrs->nrs_lock);
01227 
01228         switch ((enum nrs_ctl_tbf)opc) {
01229         default:
01230                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
01231 
01235         case NRS_CTL_TBF_RD_RULE: {
01236                 struct nrs_tbf_head *head = policy->pol_private;
01237                 struct seq_file *m = (struct seq_file *) arg;
01238                 struct ptlrpc_service_part *svcpt;
01239 
01240                 svcpt = policy->pol_nrs->nrs_svcpt;
01241                 seq_printf(m, "CPT %d:\n", svcpt->scp_cpt);
01242 
01243                 rc = nrs_tbf_rule_dump_all(head, m);
01244                 }
01245                 break;
01246 
01250         case NRS_CTL_TBF_WR_RULE: {
01251                 struct nrs_tbf_head *head = policy->pol_private;
01252                 struct nrs_tbf_cmd *cmd;
01253 
01254                 cmd = (struct nrs_tbf_cmd *)arg;
01255                 rc = nrs_tbf_command(policy,
01256                                      head,
01257                                      cmd);
01258                 }
01259                 break;
01260         }
01261 
01262         RETURN(rc);
01263 }
01264 
01278 static int nrs_tbf_res_get(struct ptlrpc_nrs_policy *policy,
01279                            struct ptlrpc_nrs_request *nrq,
01280                            const struct ptlrpc_nrs_resource *parent,
01281                            struct ptlrpc_nrs_resource **resp,
01282                            bool moving_req)
01283 {
01284         struct nrs_tbf_head   *head;
01285         struct nrs_tbf_client *cli;
01286         struct nrs_tbf_client *tmp;
01287         struct ptlrpc_request *req;
01288 
01289         if (parent == NULL) {
01290                 *resp = &((struct nrs_tbf_head *)policy->pol_private)->th_res;
01291                 return 0;
01292         }
01293 
01294         head = container_of(parent, struct nrs_tbf_head, th_res);
01295         req = container_of(nrq, struct ptlrpc_request, rq_nrq);
01296         cli = head->th_ops->o_cli_find(head, req);
01297         if (cli != NULL) {
01298                 spin_lock(&policy->pol_nrs->nrs_svcpt->scp_req_lock);
01299                 LASSERT(cli->tc_rule);
01300                 if (cli->tc_rule_sequence !=
01301                     atomic_read(&head->th_rule_sequence) ||
01302                     cli->tc_rule->tr_flags & NTRS_STOPPING) {
01303                         struct nrs_tbf_rule *rule;
01304 
01305                         rule = nrs_tbf_rule_match(head, cli);
01306                         if (rule != cli->tc_rule)
01307                                 nrs_tbf_cli_reset(head, rule, cli);
01308                         else
01309                                 nrs_tbf_rule_put(rule);
01310                 } else if (cli->tc_rule_generation !=
01311                            cli->tc_rule->tr_generation) {
01312                         nrs_tbf_cli_reset_value(head, cli);
01313                 }
01314                 spin_unlock(&policy->pol_nrs->nrs_svcpt->scp_req_lock);
01315                 goto out;
01316         }
01317 
01318         OBD_CPT_ALLOC_GFP(cli, nrs_pol2cptab(policy), nrs_pol2cptid(policy),
01319                           sizeof(*cli), moving_req ? GFP_ATOMIC : __GFP_IO);
01320         if (cli == NULL)
01321                 return -ENOMEM;
01322         nrs_tbf_cli_init(head, cli, req);
01323         tmp = head->th_ops->o_cli_findadd(head, cli);
01324         if (tmp != cli) {
01325                 atomic_dec(&cli->tc_ref);
01326                 nrs_tbf_cli_fini(cli);
01327                 cli = tmp;
01328         }
01329 out:
01330         *resp = &cli->tc_res;
01331 
01332         return 1;
01333 }
01334 
01342 static void nrs_tbf_res_put(struct ptlrpc_nrs_policy *policy,
01343                             const struct ptlrpc_nrs_resource *res)
01344 {
01345         struct nrs_tbf_head   *head;
01346         struct nrs_tbf_client *cli;
01347 
01351         if (res->res_parent == NULL)
01352                 return;
01353 
01354         cli = container_of(res, struct nrs_tbf_client, tc_res);
01355         head = container_of(res->res_parent, struct nrs_tbf_head, th_res);
01356 
01357         head->th_ops->o_cli_put(head, cli);
01358 }
01359 
01377 static
01378 struct ptlrpc_nrs_request *nrs_tbf_req_get(struct ptlrpc_nrs_policy *policy,
01379                                            bool peek, bool force)
01380 {
01381         struct nrs_tbf_head       *head = policy->pol_private;
01382         struct ptlrpc_nrs_request *nrq = NULL;
01383         struct nrs_tbf_client     *cli;
01384         struct cfs_binheap_node   *node;
01385 
01386         assert_spin_locked(&policy->pol_nrs->nrs_svcpt->scp_req_lock);
01387 
01388         if (!peek && policy->pol_nrs->nrs_throttling)
01389                 return NULL;
01390 
01391         node = cfs_binheap_root(head->th_binheap);
01392         if (unlikely(node == NULL))
01393                 return NULL;
01394 
01395         cli = container_of(node, struct nrs_tbf_client, tc_node);
01396         LASSERT(cli->tc_in_heap);
01397         if (peek) {
01398                 nrq = list_entry(cli->tc_list.next,
01399                                      struct ptlrpc_nrs_request,
01400                                      nr_u.tbf.tr_list);
01401         } else {
01402                 __u64 now = ktime_to_ns(ktime_get());
01403                 __u64 passed;
01404                 __u64 ntoken;
01405                 __u64 deadline;
01406 
01407                 deadline = cli->tc_check_time +
01408                           cli->tc_nsecs;
01409                 LASSERT(now >= cli->tc_check_time);
01410                 passed = now - cli->tc_check_time;
01411                 ntoken = passed * cli->tc_rpc_rate;
01412                 do_div(ntoken, NSEC_PER_SEC);
01413                 ntoken += cli->tc_ntoken;
01414                 if (ntoken > cli->tc_depth)
01415                         ntoken = cli->tc_depth;
01416                 if (ntoken > 0) {
01417                         struct ptlrpc_request *req;
01418                         nrq = list_entry(cli->tc_list.next,
01419                                              struct ptlrpc_nrs_request,
01420                                              nr_u.tbf.tr_list);
01421                         req = container_of(nrq,
01422                                            struct ptlrpc_request,
01423                                            rq_nrq);
01424                         ntoken--;
01425                         cli->tc_ntoken = ntoken;
01426                         cli->tc_check_time = now;
01427                         list_del_init(&nrq->nr_u.tbf.tr_list);
01428                         if (list_empty(&cli->tc_list)) {
01429                                 cfs_binheap_remove(head->th_binheap,
01430                                                    &cli->tc_node);
01431                                 cli->tc_in_heap = false;
01432                         } else {
01433                                 cfs_binheap_relocate(head->th_binheap,
01434                                                      &cli->tc_node);
01435                         }
01436                         CDEBUG(D_RPCTRACE,
01437                                "NRS start %s request from %s, "
01438                                "seq: "LPU64"\n",
01439                                policy->pol_desc->pd_name,
01440                                libcfs_id2str(req->rq_peer),
01441                                nrq->nr_u.tbf.tr_sequence);
01442                 } else {
01443                         ktime_t time;
01444 
01445                         policy->pol_nrs->nrs_throttling = 1;
01446                         head->th_deadline = deadline;
01447                         time = ktime_set(0, 0);
01448                         time = ktime_add_ns(time, deadline);
01449                         hrtimer_start(&head->th_timer, time, HRTIMER_MODE_ABS);
01450                 }
01451         }
01452 
01453         return nrq;
01454 }
01455 
01465 static int nrs_tbf_req_add(struct ptlrpc_nrs_policy *policy,
01466                            struct ptlrpc_nrs_request *nrq)
01467 {
01468         struct nrs_tbf_head   *head;
01469         struct nrs_tbf_client *cli;
01470         int                    rc = 0;
01471 
01472         assert_spin_locked(&policy->pol_nrs->nrs_svcpt->scp_req_lock);
01473 
01474         cli = container_of(nrs_request_resource(nrq),
01475                            struct nrs_tbf_client, tc_res);
01476         head = container_of(nrs_request_resource(nrq)->res_parent,
01477                             struct nrs_tbf_head, th_res);
01478         if (list_empty(&cli->tc_list)) {
01479                 LASSERT(!cli->tc_in_heap);
01480                 rc = cfs_binheap_insert(head->th_binheap, &cli->tc_node);
01481                 if (rc == 0) {
01482                         cli->tc_in_heap = true;
01483                         nrq->nr_u.tbf.tr_sequence = head->th_sequence++;
01484                         list_add_tail(&nrq->nr_u.tbf.tr_list,
01485                                           &cli->tc_list);
01486                         if (policy->pol_nrs->nrs_throttling) {
01487                                 __u64 deadline = cli->tc_check_time +
01488                                                  cli->tc_nsecs;
01489                                 if ((head->th_deadline > deadline) &&
01490                                     (hrtimer_try_to_cancel(&head->th_timer)
01491                                      >= 0)) {
01492                                         ktime_t time;
01493                                         head->th_deadline = deadline;
01494                                         time = ktime_set(0, 0);
01495                                         time = ktime_add_ns(time, deadline);
01496                                         hrtimer_start(&head->th_timer, time,
01497                                                       HRTIMER_MODE_ABS);
01498                                 }
01499                         }
01500                 }
01501         } else {
01502                 LASSERT(cli->tc_in_heap);
01503                 nrq->nr_u.tbf.tr_sequence = head->th_sequence++;
01504                 list_add_tail(&nrq->nr_u.tbf.tr_list,
01505                                   &cli->tc_list);
01506         }
01507         return rc;
01508 }
01509 
01516 static void nrs_tbf_req_del(struct ptlrpc_nrs_policy *policy,
01517                              struct ptlrpc_nrs_request *nrq)
01518 {
01519         struct nrs_tbf_head   *head;
01520         struct nrs_tbf_client *cli;
01521 
01522         assert_spin_locked(&policy->pol_nrs->nrs_svcpt->scp_req_lock);
01523 
01524         cli = container_of(nrs_request_resource(nrq),
01525                            struct nrs_tbf_client, tc_res);
01526         head = container_of(nrs_request_resource(nrq)->res_parent,
01527                             struct nrs_tbf_head, th_res);
01528 
01529         LASSERT(!list_empty(&nrq->nr_u.tbf.tr_list));
01530         list_del_init(&nrq->nr_u.tbf.tr_list);
01531         if (list_empty(&cli->tc_list)) {
01532                 cfs_binheap_remove(head->th_binheap,
01533                                    &cli->tc_node);
01534                 cli->tc_in_heap = false;
01535         } else {
01536                 cfs_binheap_relocate(head->th_binheap,
01537                                      &cli->tc_node);
01538         }
01539 }
01540 
01551 static void nrs_tbf_req_stop(struct ptlrpc_nrs_policy *policy,
01552                               struct ptlrpc_nrs_request *nrq)
01553 {
01554         struct ptlrpc_request *req = container_of(nrq, struct ptlrpc_request,
01555                                                   rq_nrq);
01556 
01557         assert_spin_locked(&policy->pol_nrs->nrs_svcpt->scp_req_lock);
01558 
01559         CDEBUG(D_RPCTRACE, "NRS stop %s request from %s, seq: "LPU64"\n",
01560                policy->pol_desc->pd_name, libcfs_id2str(req->rq_peer),
01561                nrq->nr_u.tbf.tr_sequence);
01562 }

01573 #define LPROCFS_NRS_RATE_MAX            65535
01574 
01575 static int
01576 ptlrpc_lprocfs_nrs_tbf_rule_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *data)
01577 {
01578         struct ptlrpc_service       *svc = m->private;
01579         int                          rc;
01580 
01581         seq_printf(m, "regular_requests:\n");
01587         rc = ptlrpc_nrs_policy_control(svc, PTLRPC_NRS_QUEUE_REG,
01588                                        NRS_POL_NAME_TBF,
01589                                        NRS_CTL_TBF_RD_RULE,
01590                                        false, m);
01591         if (rc == 0) {
01597         } else if (rc == -ENOSPC) {
01598                 return 0;
01599 
01604         } else if (rc != -ENODEV) {
01605                 return rc;
01606         }
01607 
01608         if (!nrs_svc_has_hp(svc))
01609                 goto no_hp;
01610 
01611         seq_printf(m, "high_priority_requests:\n");
01612         rc = ptlrpc_nrs_policy_control(svc, PTLRPC_NRS_QUEUE_HP,
01613                                        NRS_POL_NAME_TBF,
01614                                        NRS_CTL_TBF_RD_RULE,
01615                                        false, m);
01616         if (rc == 0) {
01622         } else if (rc == -ENOSPC) {
01623                 return 0;
01624         }
01625 
01626 no_hp:
01627 
01628         return rc;
01629 }
01630 
01631 static int nrs_tbf_id_parse(struct nrs_tbf_cmd *cmd, char **val)
01632 {
01633         int rc;
01634         char *token;
01635 
01636         token = strsep(val, "}");
01637         if (*val == NULL)
01638                 GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
01639 
01640         if (strlen(token) <= 1 ||
01641             token[0] != '{')
01642                 GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
01643         /* Skip '{' */
01644         token++;
01645 
01646         /* Should be followed by ' ' or nothing */
01647         if ((*val)[0] == '\0')
01648                 *val = NULL;
01649         else if ((*val)[0] == ' ')
01650                 (*val)++;
01651         else
01652                 GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
01653 
01654         rc = nrs_tbf_jobid_parse(cmd, token);
01655         if (!rc)
01656                 cmd->tc_valid_types |= NRS_TBF_FLAG_JOBID;
01657 
01658         rc = nrs_tbf_nid_parse(cmd, token);
01659         if (!rc)
01660                 cmd->tc_valid_types |= NRS_TBF_FLAG_NID;
01661 
01662         if (!cmd->tc_valid_types)
01663                 rc = -EINVAL;
01664         else
01665                 rc = 0;
01666 out:
01667         return rc;
01668 }
01669 
01670 
01671 static void nrs_tbf_cmd_fini(struct nrs_tbf_cmd *cmd)
01672 {
01673         if (cmd->tc_valid_types & NRS_TBF_FLAG_JOBID)
01674                 nrs_tbf_jobid_cmd_fini(cmd);
01675         if (cmd->tc_valid_types & NRS_TBF_FLAG_NID)
01676                 nrs_tbf_nid_cmd_fini(cmd);
01677 }
01678 
01679 static struct nrs_tbf_cmd *
01680 nrs_tbf_parse_cmd(char *buffer, unsigned long count)
01681 {
01682         static struct nrs_tbf_cmd *cmd;
01683         char                      *token;
01684         char                      *val;
01685         int                        i;
01686         int                        rc = 0;
01687 
01688         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(cmd);
01689         if (cmd == NULL)
01690                 GOTO(out, rc = -ENOMEM);
01691 
01692         val = buffer;
01693         token = strsep(&val, " ");
01694         if (val == NULL || strlen(val) == 0)
01695                 GOTO(out_free_cmd, rc = -EINVAL);
01696 
01697         /* Type of the command */
01698         if (strcmp(token, "start") == 0)
01699                 cmd->tc_cmd = NRS_CTL_TBF_START_RULE;
01700         else if (strcmp(token, "stop") == 0)
01701                 cmd->tc_cmd = NRS_CTL_TBF_STOP_RULE;
01702         else if (strcmp(token, "change") == 0)
01703                 cmd->tc_cmd = NRS_CTL_TBF_CHANGE_RATE;
01704         else
01705                 GOTO(out_free_cmd, rc = -EINVAL);
01706 
01707         /* Name of the rule */
01708         token = strsep(&val, " ");
01709         if (val == NULL) {
01714                 if (cmd->tc_cmd != NRS_CTL_TBF_STOP_RULE)
01715                         GOTO(out_free_cmd, rc = -EINVAL);
01716         }
01717 
01718         for (i = 0; i < strlen(token); i++) {
01719                 if ((!isalnum(token[i])) &&
01720                     (token[i] != '_'))
01721                         GOTO(out_free_cmd, rc = -EINVAL);
01722         }
01723         cmd->tc_name = token;
01724 
01725         if (cmd->tc_cmd == NRS_CTL_TBF_START_RULE) {
01726                 /* List of ID */
01727                 LASSERT(val);
01728                 rc = nrs_tbf_id_parse(cmd, &val);
01729                 if (rc)
01730                         GOTO(out_free_cmd, rc);
01731         }
01732 
01733         if (val != NULL) {
01734                 if (cmd->tc_cmd == NRS_CTL_TBF_STOP_RULE ||
01735                     strlen(val) == 0 || !isdigit(val[0]))
01736                         GOTO(out_free_nid, rc = -EINVAL);
01737 
01738                 cmd->tc_rpc_rate = simple_strtoull(val, NULL, 10);
01739                 if (cmd->tc_rpc_rate <= 0 ||
01740                     cmd->tc_rpc_rate >= LPROCFS_NRS_RATE_MAX)
01741                         GOTO(out_free_nid, rc = -EINVAL);
01742         } else {
01743                 if (cmd->tc_cmd == NRS_CTL_TBF_CHANGE_RATE)
01744                         GOTO(out_free_nid, rc = -EINVAL);
01745                 /* No RPC rate given */
01746                 cmd->tc_rpc_rate = tbf_rate;
01747         }
01748         goto out;
01749 out_free_nid:
01750         nrs_tbf_cmd_fini(cmd);
01751 out_free_cmd:
01752         OBD_FREE_PTR(cmd);
01753 out:
01754         if (rc)
01755                 cmd = ERR_PTR(rc);
01756         return cmd;
01757 }
01758 
01759 extern struct nrs_core nrs_core;
01760 #define LPROCFS_WR_NRS_TBF_MAX_CMD (4096)
01761 static ssize_t
01762 ptlrpc_lprocfs_nrs_tbf_rule_seq_write(struct file *file,
01763                                       const char __user *buffer,
01764                                       size_t count, loff_t *off)
01765 {
01766         struct seq_file           *m = file->private_data;
01767         struct ptlrpc_service     *svc = m->private;
01768         char                      *kernbuf;
01769         char                      *val;
01770         int                        rc;
01771         static struct nrs_tbf_cmd *cmd;
01772         enum ptlrpc_nrs_queue_type queue = PTLRPC_NRS_QUEUE_BOTH;
01773         unsigned long              length;
01774         char                      *token;
01775 
01776         OBD_ALLOC(kernbuf, LPROCFS_WR_NRS_TBF_MAX_CMD);
01777         if (kernbuf == NULL)
01778                 GOTO(out, rc = -ENOMEM);
01779 
01780         if (count > LPROCFS_WR_NRS_TBF_MAX_CMD - 1)
01781                 GOTO(out_free_kernbuff, rc = -EINVAL);
01782 
01783         if (copy_from_user(kernbuf, buffer, count))
01784                 GOTO(out_free_kernbuff, rc = -EFAULT);
01785 
01786         val = kernbuf;
01787         token = strsep(&val, " ");
01788         if (val == NULL)
01789                 GOTO(out_free_kernbuff, rc = -EINVAL);
01790 
01791         if (strcmp(token, "reg") == 0) {
01792                 queue = PTLRPC_NRS_QUEUE_REG;
01793         } else if (strcmp(token, "hp") == 0) {
01794                 queue = PTLRPC_NRS_QUEUE_HP;
01795         } else {
01796                 kernbuf[strlen(token)] = ' ';
01797                 val = kernbuf;
01798         }
01799         length = strlen(val);
01800 
01801         if (length == 0)
01802                 GOTO(out_free_kernbuff, rc = -EINVAL);
01803 
01804         if (queue == PTLRPC_NRS_QUEUE_HP && !nrs_svc_has_hp(svc))
01805                 GOTO(out_free_kernbuff, rc = -ENODEV);
01806         else if (queue == PTLRPC_NRS_QUEUE_BOTH && !nrs_svc_has_hp(svc))
01807                 queue = PTLRPC_NRS_QUEUE_REG;
01808 
01809         cmd = nrs_tbf_parse_cmd(val, length);
01810         if (IS_ERR(cmd))
01811                 GOTO(out_free_kernbuff, rc = PTR_ERR(cmd));
01812 
01817         mutex_lock(&nrs_core.nrs_mutex);
01818         rc = ptlrpc_nrs_policy_control(svc, queue,
01819                                        NRS_POL_NAME_TBF,
01820                                        NRS_CTL_TBF_WR_RULE,
01821                                        false, cmd);
01822         mutex_unlock(&nrs_core.nrs_mutex);
01823 
01824         nrs_tbf_cmd_fini(cmd);
01825         OBD_FREE_PTR(cmd);
01826 out_free_kernbuff:
01827         OBD_FREE(kernbuf, LPROCFS_WR_NRS_TBF_MAX_CMD);
01828 out:
01829         return rc ? rc : count;
01830 }
01831 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(ptlrpc_lprocfs_nrs_tbf_rule);
01832 
01841 static int nrs_tbf_lprocfs_init(struct ptlrpc_service *svc)
01842 {
01843         struct lprocfs_vars nrs_tbf_lprocfs_vars[] = {
01844                 { .name         = "nrs_tbf_rule",
01845                   .fops         = &ptlrpc_lprocfs_nrs_tbf_rule_fops,
01846                   .data = svc },
01847                 { NULL }
01848         };
01849 
01850         if (svc->srv_procroot == NULL)
01851                 return 0;
01852 
01853         return lprocfs_add_vars(svc->srv_procroot, nrs_tbf_lprocfs_vars, NULL);
01854 }
01855 
01861 static void nrs_tbf_lprocfs_fini(struct ptlrpc_service *svc)
01862 {
01863         if (svc->srv_procroot == NULL)
01864                 return;
01865 
01866         lprocfs_remove_proc_entry("nrs_tbf_rule", svc->srv_procroot);
01867 }
